name: Azazel School of Magic
description:
Azael School of Magic is a Visual Novel that is a small group project that was completed in 3 weeks.  

Synopsis: You are a new student at the prestigious Azazel School of Magic. Go to magical classes, meet new friends, and maybe even find love. Heavy emphasis on dialogue, characters, atmosphere, and player choice outcomes.

This game is finished, but if you would like more please comment.

Duration: 5-7 minutes of playtime.
